mapper.update:

member_pw = #{memberPw},
member_name = #{adminName},
member_phone = #{memberPhone},
member_email = #{memberEmail},
position_level_code = #{positionLevelCode},
member_reg_date = #{memberRegDate},
member_status = #{memberStatus},
company_code = #{companyCode},
WHERE member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.select:
/* 특정 휴면 회원 조회 */ select member_id ,member_pw ,member_name ,member_email ,member_phone ,company_code ,member_reg_date ,dormant_member_reg_date
from member_info where member_status='dormant' ,member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.update: /* 휴면회원 일반회원으로 */ UPDATE member_info SET member_status = 'normal', dormant_member_reg_date = null WHERE member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.select: /* 업체별 직원 조회 */ SELECT * FROM member_info as m inner join company_position_level as cp on m.position_level_code = cp.position_level_code WHERE m.company_code = #{companyCode} and m.member_status != 'dormant';
